Troubleshooting Guide

If you're having trouble accessing protected routes:

  1. Use the Check Current Session button to verify you have a valid session
  2. If no valid session, try the Quick Login options
  3. After login, wait at least 5 seconds before trying to access protected routes
  4. If login succeeds but you still can't access routes, try Clear All Storage and login again
  5. Use the direct navigation links that appear after successful login
